rules.title: üîÅ Sidebar ‚Üî Route ‚Üî Component Synchronization
rules.description: Ensure every route in Sidebar.tsx has a matching component file and is registered in the routing tree.
actions: Scan Sidebar.tsx and extract all declared routes and labels under `path` and `id`.
For each path (e.g. 'trips/reports'), confirm a matching file exists in src/pages/ or src/components/ (e.g. src/components/trips/TripReports.tsx).
If missing, auto-generate a .tsx scaffold file using the route label as title, include placeholder layout with a heading and container.
Inject route into App.tsx or relevant router if not yet declared.

rules.title: üìÑ Component Integrity & Data Flow
rules.description: Ensure that sidebar-linked components are connected to Firestore and show visible output in UI.
actions: Open each component referenced in sidebar routes.
Verify it has a valid export and renders usable JSX (at minimum, a heading and layout).
If route implies data (e.g. 'Trip Reports'), confirm use of onSnapshot or data-fetching logic.
If missing, scaffold fake data usage with Firestore hooks and mock data if needed.

rules.title: üí° Innovation on Missing Outputs
rules.description: For sidebar routes with no visible effect in the UI, generate appropriate content based on logic.
actions: Use existing UI components from @/components/ui (e.g. Card, Table, Chart).
For 'Analytics' routes, generate KPIs, graphs, and visual feedback.
For 'Workshop' or 'Tyre' routes, use tables, job card modals, and fire-event logic.
Ensure every route clicked from sidebar results in a page with meaningful output.

rules.title: ‚úÖ Outcome Expectations
rules.description: Nothing in the sidebar may point to a dead or blank screen. All views must load content.
actions: Render a warning in Copilot or Output if any route has no matching .tsx file or visible UI outcome.
Show a CodeLens-style hover hint: 'Missing route component ‚Äì click to auto-generate'.
Auto-fix where allowed or provide clickable instructions to scaffold missing logic.
